page.text: Laura Stradford
Jersey City, NJ 07302
laurastradford@yahoo.com
Objective:
An entry level paralegal position using my science background.
Education:
B.S. in Biology Magna Cum Laude from St. Peter's College, Jersey City, NJ May 2007
Qualifications:
Willingness to take criticism and learn
Strong research skills.
Ability to communicate well with others
Experience:
Internship in Infectious Disease at St. Michael's Hospital. Newark. Summer 2006.
Worked with research manager visiting patients and evaluating their progress on different drug
trials. Assisted with charting and other secretarial tasks.
Health Teacher at Resurrection School. Jersey City. Fall 2006. Taught Kindergarten through
Eighth Grade basic health skills to students on a grade by grade basis.
Work Study Position in Admissions at St. Peter's College. Jersey City. Fall 2003
Fall 2004. Led tours for prospective incoming freshman, helped to prepare for open houses, and
performed many secretarial tasks.
Related Coursework:
General Biology, Cell and Molecular Biology, Microbiology, Chemistry, Organic Chemistry,
Research Methods and Skills, Hematology, Genetics, Biomedical Applications of DNA
Technology
Honors and Activities:
Study Abroad at Kingston University in London Fall 05-Spring 06
International Scholar Laureate Program Delegation on Medicine China Spring 05
Dean's List Fall 03-Spring 07
Volunteer at St. Joseph's Home for the Blind in Jersey City Fall 03
Beta-Beta-Beta Biological Honors Society- Spring 05-07
References Available Upon Request
